thread.section_title: Timhotel Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and View was amazing!
thread.title_full: Great Location and View was amazing! - Review of Timhotel Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: pisces2sea
title: Great Location and View was amazing!
text: We had the Paris view room. It was a bit small, but I expected it to be as such. No big deal as we did not spend much time in the room. Great location in Montmarte, close to friends who rented apartments. So easy to get to Metro and many Bistros in the area. We would definitely come back! Staff was very helpful on booking a shuttle for an early morning flight.
